post.body: LOL. How in the hell would he know it's a damn TJMaxx polo- unless that's where he's at on payday?
LMAO!!! Oh hell no!
As a cocktail waitress: I appreciate that YOU get the concept. Drink if you're sitting there, if not, get the 'eff on...
LOL. You tryna ask I was drunk Tweeting?!? I was wondering if anyone would be able to tell!
You know they use every opportunity. LOL. My 3 year old does the same thing.
Wow. LOL. Really?
LOL. Yeah, that may be a problem.
I believe it. I've wanted to write 4 Vibe since I knew I could write, situations occur & so forth, so who knows where I'll end up...
What was Vibe like? When you worked there, I mean?
LOL. How often are you down here?
LOL. Leave that dude alone.
What's the cover for that show?
LOL. I went back to Mary Poppins. I'd rather this than THAT...
Offa Edgewood. If you're coming from GSU campus, u go under the I-85 overpass. Straight for a few blocks & it's on the left.
@Haziq Have you ever been to Cafe Circa? That seems like a chill lil' spot.
LOL. I guess.
LOL. Very well-said!!
LMAO! I know that's right! Good credit and choosing the right dude- AFTER that diploma.
Aww, hell naw. LOL.
LOL. For real.
What's your usual? That Whiskey Smash sounds devastating (smile).
Dinner first, I'm thinking. Then, drinks and dancing.
Now I feel my parents on how confused they were when I asked for homework help.
Very well-said.
Lending to the broad belief that we're all coons.
@kingboola Hell Date was a guilty pleasure- definitely NOT to be taken seriously though...
I agree. They definitely have some stepping up 2 do over at TV 1 but BET is virtually standing still. Or taking steps back.
GET IT DRES!!
RED FLAG! RED FLAG! LOL. Seriously, issues with mom, you don't wanna get into all that, do you?
TV One will prolly surpass BET in a minute...
Happy Born Day!
LOL. Wow. I thought I was the only one that felt like that when certain "somebodies" embraced me. Well-said.
Wow. (nodding) That's big.
LMAO! You're crazy!
LOL. You're a trip.
LOL. And you look for the chick in the strapless black dress, going hard to the same playlist. Umm... maybe minus the GucciMane!
trashbagaesthics.com, smokingsection.com, hypebeast.com
Damned if I wait in THAT bound-to-be long ass line.
Signing off to the sounds of "Goin In 4 Life". G' Night Twitterers.
I'm tired now. Crashing. Sipping this Hen. Dreading work meeting @ 10 a.m., then working 4 p.m. shift in heels tomorrow...
YO! Finally listening to this Drake mix. THXS @randyexclusive!!! I fux with this kid. His flow may be the shining hope for these young kids!
My 1st time Twitting today. It's been hectic. Received check. Entire thing went 2 fixing whip. Dropped Keiko off w/ Daddy. Then off 2 work.

"Your swag owe my swag everythaang..."
-Nadine
I really do dig my lil' Twitter circle. Everyone's positive minded and there isn't too much argumentative bullshit. Hooray. Tipsy-Twitting.
Is tight that she's just hearing about this girl. I love her story! http://tinyurl.com/5seyal
Is wishing that the guy who created the term "bromance" would stick his head in the oven and turn the gas on...
Otis Redding wrote "Respect"?!?
Trying to figure out what the next move will be.
Damn, ain't she been a woman for years? LOL.
Key 'bout to go upside that dude's head! LOL.
The Keyshia I always remind myself of- pre-explosion. Seems like only a couple years ago. http://tinyurl.com/58dv6k
Watching "The Way It Is". Remembering Keyshia before she blew up.
Soulja Boy has goons? Really?
Watching Mary Poppins on ABC Fam with Keiko. She's mesmerized. I LOVED this movie as a kid. Still do. Need the DVD.
*damn Loosies*
The three year old is up from a bad dream, now she's on her laptop like Mommy...
A greasy older man that I work with- correction: works in THE BUILDING with me- asked me for a "Christmas Hug" today. Ugh.
I NEED to see about some curried goat leftovers, but I'm playing catch up with the newest downloads... I'm HUNGRY.
Gifts are all wrapped. Baby running around, me and the ex are on that Hen, he and his sister talking about high school.
Just applied @ Velvet Room. Now I'm @ the house w/ my kid getting ready to celebrate with her dad.
